name: Ledyba

evolution.description: Ledyba can evolve into Ledian at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Five Star Pokémon. These very cowardly Pokémon join together and use Reflect to protect their nest.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Early Bird
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on rolls to wake from sleep.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
